```{r data, include=FALSE}
data <- read.csv("./PSG x WatchPAT 11.9.22.csv")
data <- data %>% filter(!is.na(PSG...AHI))

dem.reg <- mcreg(data$PSG...AHI,data$WatchPAT...AHI, method.reg = "Deming")
```


```{r echo=FALSE}
kable(summary(dem.reg))
```
